item.title: [Help] How can i make Moving FireCape?
item.dc:creator: @mod_kay mod kay
item.description:
@mod_kay wrote:

Hello Moparscape,

Moparscape! Could you please help me! I’m using ‘317Deob’ and i need my FireCape to move, i’ve added this;

if(i == 6570){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 9631;//item look class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 400; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 2047; class8.anInt169 = -8; class8.anInt194 = 12; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Fire Cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A cape of fire.".getBytes(); }

Somone help me please?
